stimulusHtml: A function f has Maclaurin series given by  x 4 2 ! + x 5 3 ! + x 6 4 ! + ⋯ + x n + 3 ( n + 1 ) ! + ⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@55B7@ . Which of the following is an expression for  f ( x ) ? MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D6E@
choicesHtml: − 3 x sin x + 3 x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@433B@

− cos ( x 2 ) + 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@422F@

− x 2 cos x + x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42CE@

x 2 e x − x 3 − x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4356@

e x 2 − x 2 − 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4105@
